Translations.Text: Ha, mi mu [alabo yu er ge zimu de yinyi, wei an la zui zhidao qi yi].
Yi zhe bu mingbai [chanming wanshi wanwu] de jingdian [“gulanjing”] fashi!
Wo dique zai yi ge jiqing zhi ye [zhaiyue de gai de'er ye, jian di 97 zhang] jiang shi ta [“gulanjing”], wo yizhi zai jinggao [renlei, fan bu xinyang an la du yi zhe bi zao yancheng].
Zai nage yeli, yiqie zhuding de shi dou yi panding [ru shengsi zainan deng].
Na shi you wo banbu de yi xiang mingling, wo que shi chang paiqian shizhe de;
na shi cong ni de zhu jiang shi de yi xiang enhui. Ta que shi quan wen de, quanzhi de.
[Na shi cong] tiandi wanwu de zhu [an la] jiang shi de, jiaru nimen duxin.
Chu ta wai, zai meiyou ying shou chongbai de zhu. Ta neng shi sizhe sheng, neng shi sheng zhe si.[Ta shi] nimen de zhu, yeshi nimen zuxian de zhu.
Qishi, tamen shi zai huaiyi zhong qule de.
Ni dang dengdai tiankong chuxian mingxian yanwu [zhu] di na ri,
na yanwu jiang longzhao renlei, zhe shi yi zhong tongku de xingfa.
[Bei yanwu longzhao zhe jiang shuo]:“Women de zhu a! Qiu ni wei women jiechu xingfa ba! Women zhen de xinyangle.”
[Xingfa yi jianglin tamen, ci shi] tamen zen neng huode quangao [de yichu] ne? You wei mingbai xuanjiao de shizhe [mu sheng] que yi lailin tamen,
er tamen que beili ta [mu sheng]. Tamen shuo:“[Ta shi] yi wei shouguo chuanshou de fengzi.”
Wo jiang zhanshi jiechu xingfa, er nimen ye jiang yuanxing bilu [huifu panni].
Dang wo jinxing da tuxi di na ri, wo bi jiang yancheng [tamen].
Wo que yi zai tamen zhiqian kaoyanguo falao de renmin, na shi you wei zungui de shizhe [mu sa] yi lailin tamen.
[Mu sa shuo]:“Nimen ba an la de pu renmen [yiselie de houyi] jiao gei wo ba! Wo dui nimen que shi yi wei zhongshi de shizhe.
Nimen buyao dui an la gao'ao, wo dique gei nimen dai laile mingzheng.
Wo qiu wo de zhu, yeshi nimen de zhu baohu, mian zao nimen shi ji wo [zhu].
Jiaru nimen bu xiangxin wo, nimen ke likai wo.”
[Dan tamen tiaoxin ta], yushi ta [mu sa] qiqiu ta de zhu [shuo]:“Zhexie ren que shi fanzui de minzhong.”
[An la shuo]:“Ni daizhe wo de pu renmen zai yejian chuzou ba! Yinwei nimen bi jiang bei [falao de jundui] zhuigan.
Ni rang haishui pingjing [fenkai] ba! Tamen kending shi yao bei yan si de jundui.”
Tamen [falao de renmin] liu xiale duoshao guoyuan, quanyuan,
tiandi he haozhai,
yiji tamen xiangshouguo de xingfu shenghuo!
Qi jieguo shi: Wo shi qita minzhong jichengle tamen [zhu][ru an la shi yiselie de houyi jichengle aiji de wangquan].
Tiandi meiyou wei tamen kuqi, tamen ye bu bei huanxing.
Wo que yi zhengjiu yiselie de houyi tuoli falao lingru de xingfa. Ta que shi aoman guofen de.
[Mu sa shidai] wo que yi ping zhenzhi xuanze tamen [yiselie de houyi] you yu shiren.
Wo ceng ciyu tamen xuduo jixiang, qizhong you yici mingxian de kaoyan.
Zhexie ren [gu lai shen ren] bi jiang shuo:
“Women zhiyou di yi ci de siwang, women jue bu hui bei fuhuo.
Jiaru nimen shi chengshi zhe,[xianzai] nimen jiu ba women [yi gu] de zuxian zhaohui lai [fuhuo] ba!”
Shi tamen geng hao ne? Haishi tu ba de zuren he tamen de qian ren geng hao? Wo huimiele tamen, yinwei tamen que shi fanzui zhe.
Wo chuangzao tiandi wanwu bingfei erxi.
Wo zhi yi zhenli [jianyan shei shi shuncong an la zhe, shei shi weikang an la zhe; baochou shuncong zhe, chengfa weikang zhe] chuangzao tiandi, dan tamen da duoshu ren bing bu zhidao.
Panjue ri que shi wei tamen quanti guiding de shijian.
Zai na ri, qinyou dui qinyou hao wu yichu, tamen ye de bu dao renhe yuanzhu,
wei an la ci min zhe liwai [zhu]. Ta [an la] que shi quanneng de, te ci de.
[Huo yu li] zan gumu shu de guozi,
que shi zuiren de shiwu,
xiang tong shui yiyang zai [tamen de] fu zhong feiteng,
xiang feishui yiyang feiteng.
[You hua sheng shuo]:“Nimen zhua zhu ta, ba ta tuo ru huo yu de zhongyang,
ranhou, nimen ba feishui de xingfa jiao zai ta de tou shang.
Ni changshi [zhe zhong xingfa] ba! Ni [zai chenshi shi] shi duome wangzizunda, duome fugui!
Zhe jiushi nimen [zai chenshi shi] suo huaiyi de [xingfa].”
Jingwei zhe bi zhu zai anquan di difang [leyuan]:
Leyuan he quanshui pang,
tamen chuan de shi jinxiu sichou, yingmian er zuo.
Qi jieguo shi: Wo shi baijing mei mu xianshu di meinu zuo tamen de qizi.
Tamen zai leyuan li jiang anquan de suoqu ge zhong shuiguo.
Chu [chenshi] di yi ci de siwang wai, tamen zai leyuan li jiang bu zai changshi siwang. Ta [an la] jiang baohu tamen mian shou huo yu de xingfa [zhu].
Zhe shi cong ni de zhu jiang shi de enhui, zhe que shi weida de chenggong.
Wo dique yi ni de yuyan shi zhe bu “gulanjing” chengwei yi dong de, yibian tamen jieshou quangao.
Ni [mu sheng] dang dengdai, tamen dique ye zai dengdai.
